title: Android Auto nearly ready to launch USB cable quality checker; here’s how it works [Gallery]
content:
Android Auto is finally nearing a rollout for a tool we first spotted nearly a year ago. With the latest update, Android Auto can check the quality of your USB cable to see if it’s causing you any issues.

more…

The post Android Auto nearly ready to launch USB cable quality checker; here’s how it works [Gallery] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Android Auto is preparing to add a new tool to check the quality of your USB cable, and it works pretty easily. Here's how.
